channel.title: Astirch.com | LF advertisers | GFX Designers
channel.description:
My team and I have been working with Astirch for a couple of weeks now and it's soon ready to be launched for beta.
We are in need of some GFX designers try create banners, logos, headers or what ever is needed.
Our website: http://www.astirch.com/ (Currently being developed)
We are also in need of some advertisers whom will work with getting players to the server, writing good threads on gaming forums, managing the toplists. If you'd like to apply for this position then you've to be able to write very well English.
The server is one of a kind, it's a 194/289 look a like.
Add me on skype if you've further interest: Bobbyp95
Astirch - when saradomin was cool.

item.description:
@neokairo wrote:

naseem142:

I can make you logos/banners/headers/gfx work if you want.

Add my skype and we can have a chat.

Skype: Bobbyp95
